original:
Natural Learning


Those who strive, those who endure-are granted mastery beyond mere training. [pagebreak] BLOCK
  • 20 - Defender's Stance: +5% damage blocked
  • 30 - Firm Grip: +15% bash damage
  • 40 - Braced Focus: -3% stagger taken while blocking
  • 50 - Elemental Brace: -3% spell damage taken while blocking
  • 60 - Guard's Force: +15% bash damage
  • 70 - Balanced Posture: -2% stagger taken while blocking
  • 80 - Iron Wall: +5% damage blocked
  • 90 - Crushing Blow: +20% bash damage
  • 100 - Perfect Form: +5% damage blocked
 [pagebreak] ONE-HANDED
  • 20 - Precision: +1% Critical Hit Chance
  • 30 - Endurance: -5% Stamina cost for Power Attacks
  • 40 - Brutality: +20% Critical Hit Damage
  • 50 - Momentum: +4% Base Damage
  • 60 - Executioner: +20% Critical Hit Damage
  • 70 - Focus: +1% Critical Hit Chance
  • 80 - Blade Mastery: +4% Base Damage
  • 90 - Crushing Blows: +5% Power Attack Damage
  • 100 - Mastery: +4% Base Damage
 [pagebreak] TWO-HANDED
  • 20 - Precision: +1.5% Critical Hit Chance
  • 30 - Endurance: -5% Stamina cost for Power Attacks
  • 40 - Brutality: +30% Critical Hit Damage
  • 50 - Momentum: +4% Base Damage
  • 60 - Sunder: 8% Armor Penetration on Power Attacks

  • 80 - Blade Mastery: +4% Base Damage
  • 90 - Heavy Impact: +5% Power Attack Damage
  • 100 - Mastery: +4% Base Damage
 [pagebreak] MARKSMAN
  • 20 - Precision: +1.5% Critical Hit Chance
  • 30 - Recovery: +5% Arrow Recovery Chance
  • 40 - Deadly Shot: +50% Critical Hit Damage
  • 50 - Steady Aim: +4% Base Damage
  • 60 - Opportunist: Attacks ignore 20% of the target's armor when the target is not in combat
  • 70 - Scavenger: +5% Arrow Recovery Chance
  • 80 - Perfect Draw: +4% Base Damage
  • 90 - First Strike: +10% Damage against targets with more than 98% Health
  • 100 - Master Marksman: +4% Base Damage
 [pagebreak] SNEAK
  • 20 - Whisper Steps: +3 Detection Resistance
  • 30 - Silent Breath: +10% Stamina regeneration while sneaking
  • 40 - Veil of Dusk: +3 Detection Resistance
  • 50 - Elusive Form: -3% incoming damage while sneaking
  • 60 - Silent Precision: +0.5% Critical Hit Chance
  • 70 - Ghost Presence: +3 Detection Resistance
  • 80 - Fade into Shadows: +2 Detection Resistance
  • 90 - Predatory Instinct: -10% target armor
  • 100 - Shadowguard: -5% Armor Weight
 [pagebreak] DESTRUCTION
  • 20 - Efficient Casting: -3% Magicka cost
  • 30 - Focused Flow: +4% Spell Damage
  • 40 - Twin Force: +4% Spell Damage while dual casting
  • 50 - Energy Conservation: -3% Magicka cost
  • 60 - Destruction Pressure: +4% Spell Damage
  • 70 - Synchronized Flow: -3% Magicka cost while dual casting
  • 80 - Destruction Resilience: While casting, incoming Destruction spells are 5% less effective against you
  • 90 - Intensity: +4% Spell Damage
  • 100 - Burning Focus: Destruction spells last 15% longer against hostile targets
 [pagebreak] CONJURATION
  • 20 - Summoner's Flow: -3% Magicka cost for Conjuration spells
  • 30 - Lasting Link: +10% duration of Conjuration spells
  • 40 - Bound Strength: +4% damage with Bound Weapons
  • 50 - Efficient Binding: -3% Magicka cost for Conjuration spells
  • 60 - Stable Rift: +4% spell magnitude for Conjuration spells
  • 70 - Oblivion Focus: -3% Magicka cost for Conjuration spells
  • 80 - Bound Edge: +4% damage with Bound Weapons
  • 90 - Deepened Pact: +4% spell magnitude for Conjuration spells
  • 100 - Eternal Servants: +10% duration of Conjuration spells
 [pagebreak] ILLUSION
  • 20 - Quiet Intent: -3% Magicka cost for Illusion spells
  • 30 - Subtle Pressure: +10% magnitude for Calm spells
  • 40 - Unseen Terror: +10% magnitude for Fear spells
  • 50 - Ghoststep: -10% physical damage while invisible
  • 60 - Mental Focus: -3% Magicka cost for Illusion spells
  • 70 - Deep Trickery: +10% magnitude for Illusion spells
  • 80 - Lingering Veil: +10% duration for Illusion spells
  • 90 - Will Shaper: +10% magnitude for Illusion spells
  • 100 - Master of the Mind: +10% duration for Illusion spells
 [pagebreak] ALTERATION
  • 20 - Mental Discipline: -3% Magicka cost for Alteration spells
  • 30 - Hardened Shell: +25% duration for armor spells
  • 40 - Efficient Weaving: -10% Magicka cost for armor spells
  • 50 - Arcane Plating: +10% strength of armor spells
  • 60 - Control Flow: +10% magnitude for non-armor Alteration spells

  • 100 - Worldbinder: +25% duration for all Alteration spells
 [pagebreak] RESTORATION
  • 20 - Healer's Touch: -3% Magicka cost for Restoration spells

  • 90 - Pure Radiance: +4% magnitude for Restoration spells
  • 100 - Holy Armor: Gain +80 armor while casting spells
string:
自然学习


天道酬勤。 [pagebreak] 格挡
  • 20 - 防御姿态：伤害格挡+5%
  • 30 - 有力回击：盾击伤害+15%
  • 40 - 稳扎稳打：格挡时被击退几率-3%
  • 50 - 元素屏障：格挡时所受法术伤害-3%
  • 60 - 石破天惊：盾击伤害+15%
  • 70 - 不动如山：格挡时被击退几率-2%
  • 80 - 铜墙铁壁：伤害格挡+5%
  • 90 - 干坤一击：盾击伤害+20%
  • 100 - 坚不可摧：伤害格挡+5%
 [pagebreak] 单手武器
  • 20 - 精准打击：暴击几率+1%
  • 30 - 坚韧不拔：重击体力消耗-5%
  • 40 - 正中要害：暴击伤害+20%
  • 50 - 娴熟挥击：基础伤害+4%
  • 60 - 透体贯穿：暴击伤害+20%
  • 70 - 一剑封喉：暴击几率+1%
  • 80 - 得心应手：基础伤害+4%
  • 90 - 削铁如泥：重击伤害+5%
  • 100 - 白虹贯日：基础伤害+4%
 [pagebreak] 双手武器
  • 20 - 精准打击：暴击几率+1.5%
  • 30 - 坚韧不拔：重击体力消耗-5%
  • 40 - 正中要害：暴击伤害+30%
  • 50 - 娴熟挥击：基础伤害+4%
  • 60 - 无坚不摧：重击无视目标8%护甲
  • 70 - 横扫千军：重击伤害+5%
  • 80 - 势如破竹：基础伤害+4%
  • 90 - 摧枯拉朽：重击伤害+5%
  • 100 - 崩山裂地：基础伤害+4%
 [pagebreak] 箭术
  • 20 - 精准打击：暴击几率+1.5%
  • 30 - 刮地寻矢：箭矢回收几率+5%
  • 40 - 破甲穿云：暴击伤害+50%
  • 50 - 稳定瞄准：基础伤害+4%
  • 60 - 伺机而动：目标未进入战斗时，攻击无视其20%护甲
  • 70 - 草船借箭：箭矢回收几率+5%
  • 80 - 蓄势待发：基础伤害+4%
  • 90 - 先发制人：对生命值高于98%的目标伤害+10%
  • 100 - 百步穿杨：基础伤害+4%
 [pagebreak] 潜行
  • 20 - 蹑手蹑脚：侦测抗性+3
  • 30 - 静默唿吸：潜行时体力恢复+10%
  • 40 - 悄声匿迹：侦测抗性+3
  • 50 - 暗度陈仓：潜行时受到伤害-3%
  • 60 - 攻其不备：暴击几率+0.5%
  • 70 - 神出鬼没：侦测抗性+3
  • 80 - 踏雪无痕：侦测抗性+2
  • 90 - 笑里藏刀：无视目标10%护甲
  • 100 - 万物皆虚：护甲重量-5%
 [pagebreak] 毁灭系
  • 20 - 高效施法：魔法消耗-3%
  • 30 - 聚焦流动：法术伤害+4%
  • 40 - 双重聚爆：双手施法时法术伤害+4%
  • 50 - 后劲绵长：魔法消耗-3%
  • 60 - 雷霆万钧：法术伤害+4%
  • 70 - 双龙出海：双手施法时魔法消耗-3%
  • 80 - 我行我素：施法时，受到毁灭系法术的效果降低5%
  • 90 - 灰飞烟灭：法术伤害+4%
  • 100 - 毁天灭地：法术效果持续时间+15%
 [pagebreak] 召唤系
  • 20 - 以逸待劳：魔法消耗-3%
  • 30 - 持久联结：法术效果持续时间+10%
  • 40 - 心念剑至：凝聚武器伤害+4%
  • 50 - 魂契俭省：魔法消耗-3%
  • 60 - 稳定裂隙：法术强度+4%
  • 70 - 不竭之源：魔法消耗-3%
  • 80 - 灵兵天降：凝聚武器伤害+4%
  • 90 - 神力共盟：法术强度+4%
  • 100 - 生死主宰：法术效果持续时间+10%
 [pagebreak] 幻术系
  • 20 - 润物无声：魔法消耗-3%
  • 30 - 言出法随：安抚术强度+10%
  • 40 - 不战而溃：恐惧术强度+10%
  • 50 - 避实就虚：隐身时受到物理伤害-10%
  • 60 - 心诡不竭：魔法消耗-3%
  • 70 - 夺魄惊心：法术强度+10%
  • 80 - 潜移默化：法术效果持续时间+10%
  • 90 - 翻云覆雨：法术强度+10%
  • 100 - 众生癫狂：法术效果持续时间+10%
 [pagebreak] 变化系
  • 20 - 克己守心：魔法消耗-3%
  • 30 - 培元固本：护甲术持续时间+25%
  • 40 - 举重若轻：护甲术魔法消耗-10%
  • 50 - 固若金汤：护甲术强度+10%
  • 60 - 操弄自如：非护甲类法术强度+10%
  • 70 - 凝神静气：魔法消耗-3%
  • 80 - 生生不息：非护甲类法术效果持续时间+25%
  • 90 - 驾驭五行：法术强度+4%
  • 100 - 执掌干坤：法术效果持续时间+25%
 [pagebreak] 恢复系
  • 20 - 医者仁心：魔法消耗-3%
  • 30 - 春风化雨：目标生命值低于50%时，治疗术效果+12%
  • 40 - 全神贯注：结界术强度+10%
  • 50 - 心平气和：魔法恢复速率+10%
  • 60 - 崇高信念：除治疗和结界术外，法术强度+5%
  • 70 - 周行不殆：魔法消耗-3%
  • 80 - 神恩浩荡：来自亡灵的物理伤害-3%
  • 90 - 回天有术：法术强度+4%
  • 100 - 力挽狂澜：施法时获得+80点护甲值

original: Select a skill to see your progress. Click Next to view the next set of skills.
string: 选择一项技能以查看进度。点击继续以查看其他技能。

original: Select a skill to see your progress. Click Next to view the next set of skills.
string: 选择一项技能以查看进度。点击继续以查看其他技能。
